plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Birds like to sit in me. What am I?
I am colorful and pretty. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be red, yellow, or blue.
🐝 Bees get yummy food from me.

plant.question: I am long and yellow. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I turn yellow when I'm ripe.
🌴 I grow on a tall plant.

plant.question: I am red and round. You can take a bite out of me. What am I?
I am orange, and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me!
I am big and bumpy and grow on a vine. You can carve me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 People use me to make jack-o'-lanterns.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. I taste yummy at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a yellow plant.
🔥 I need heat to become fluffy.
🎬 You eat me in a box.

plant.question: I am a green vegetable. I look like a small tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 You can dip me in ranch.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit with a green rind and red inside. I'm very juicy!

hints.text: 🍉 I am very refreshing on a hot day.
🏖 You eat me in the summer.

plant.question: I am a food item derived from a plant that gives us a sweet treat. I am brown and yummy! What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I can be in bars or drinks!
🌴 People love to eat me as dessert.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You have to take my coat off before eating me!

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 You can add sprinkles on top of me.

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 You can pick me from a tree.
🍎 Doctors say I keep them away!
🥧 You can make pie with me.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 I help bunnies see really well.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🌾 You can find me on a farm.

food.question: I am a drink that is white and comes from a cow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal on a farm.
🥣 You can pour me on cereal.

food.question: I am brown and crunchy. I grow underground. You can make fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can fry me to make a yummy treat.
🌱 I have eyes, but cannot see.

food.question: I am red and juicy inside. I have a green skin. I am very big. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am a refreshing treat in the summer.

food.question: I am made of flour, water and yeast. You can eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am baked in an oven.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am made from grapes that grow on vines. Adults drink me but not usually children. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 I can be red or white.
